  • Auto Complete
  • Avatar

  • Breadcrumbs

  • Cards
  • Carousel

  • Color Picker

  • Drawer
  • Expansion Panel
  • Grid List
  • List
  • Menu & Paper
  • Pickers
  • Popovers
  • Progressbar
  • Selection
  • Selects
  • Snackbar

  • Text Fields
  • Typography

Badge

4 types of badge design are available inside badge menu. You can use any of this. To use this follow the instruct code example given below.

Basic Example

To show this type of badge you will need this code in down here. 


        

            Primary
            Secondary
            Success
            Danger
            Warning
            Info
            Light
            Dark
